questions.question_text: Which two options are requirements to implement the Route Health Injection feature in a data center? (Choose two.)

choices.A: a Layer 2 connection between the service chassis and the aggregation switch
choices.C: a routing protocol configured between the service chassis and the aggregation switch
choices.E: integrated services enabled on a Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series Switch
choices.D: integrated services enabled on a Cisco Nexus 5000 Series Switch
choices.B: firewall services enabled on a Cisco Catalyst 6500 Series Switch

questions.question_text: Which three elements form a 24-bit Fibre Channel address? (Choose three.)

choices.C: Cisco MDS 9000 Family 8-Gbps Advanced Fibre Channel Switching Module
choices.D: Cisco MDS 9000 Family IP Storage Services Module
choices.B: Cisco MDS 9000 Family Multiprotocol Services Module
choices.A: Cisco MDS 9000 Family Storage Services Module
choices.E: Cisco MDS 9000 Family Storage Processor Node

questions.question_text: Which two Cisco MDS 9500 line cards support SME? (Choose two.)
You plan to implement Cisco Nexus 7000 Series switches in a data center. Which two factors must be considered for the implementation? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Each F-Series module that runs FCoE requires an FCoE license.
choices.E: F3-Series modules lack support for FEX.
choices.D: F1-Series and F2-Series modules cannot exist in the same VDC.
choices.B: In storage VDCs, you can have only storage traffic.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
all other option ruled out

comments.content:
The 7000 F3-Series module can be used in conjunction with Cisco Nexus 2000 Series Fabric Extenders (FEX). The 2000 Series fabric extenders simplify data center architecture and operations by dramatically reducing the number of points of management.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/switches/nexus-7000-series-switches/datasheet-c78-733366.html

Each F Series module that runs FCoE requires an FCoE license. https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/nexus7000/sw/fcoe/config/cisco_nexus7000_fcoe_config_guide/configuring_fcoe.html#reference_A33C9A360D18408DA3BEF0C406FE9094

discussion.content: "Separate license per module" seems to be invalid option. Licenses are applied to a switch...

questions.question_text: What are two benefits of a service insertion that is mediated through the Cisco APIC instead of the classical Ethernet model? (Choose two.)

choices.E: provides built-in services, such as Cisco ACE Web Application Firewall and ADC
choices.C: provide policies that can manage the network and service appliances
